overview: Musical short featuring Hal Swain's Kit Kat Band.  'The Prince Twins sing Sweet Music, Six Gainsborough Girls dance on a Hawaiian beach to the haunting tones of Aloha, the Plaza Boys give an excellent demonstration of acrobatic dancing, Hal Swain sings Sarah Jane, and the Prince Twins close the show with Come On Baby.' (The Bioscope)
title: Alfresco
